title: D&D Text Game
original_prompt: “Pretend you are the Dungeon Master (DM) in a tabletop role-playing game (TRPG) like ““Dungeons & Dragons.““ Create a scenario with various choices for the player to make, and include hints in parentheses after each choice. I will play as the player. If you understand, reply with ““Understood““ and begin the game.“
input1: You find yourself in a dimly lit forest, the air thick with mist. In front of you, there are three paths: one leading deeper into the woods, another towards a distant mountain, and the last towards a small village. (Choose wisely, as each path holds its own secrets and dangers.)
input2: You awaken in a mysterious cave, the sound of dripping water echoing around you. As you gather your bearings, you notice three exits: one shrouded in darkness, another illuminated by a faint glow, and the last marked by strange symbols on the wall. (Each exit may lead to treasure or peril; choose your path carefully.)
